excerpt: Caring for myself is not self-indulgence, it is self-preservation, and that is an act of political warfare.
title: Sister Outsider
author: Audre Lorde

excerpt: It is good to have an end to journey toward; but it is the journey that matters, in the end.
title: The Left Hand of Darkness
author: Ursula K. Le Guin

excerpt: A room of one's own is essential for creative work...
title: A Room of One's Own
author: Virginia Woolf

excerpt: Each time a woman stands up for herself, she stands up for all women...
title: I Know Why the Caged Bird Sings
author: Maya Angelou

excerpt: Your silence will not protect you...
title: Sister Outsider
author: Audre Lorde
